name: Pinata Clicker (StepOst)
description:
2D physics-based clicker game with simple mechanics, charming visuals and pleasant music.

Gamemods:

Candymode - you need to collect a certain amount of candy as fast as you can. Make a mess on your screen with those candies.

Timemod - you have to crush as many pinatas as you can for 25 second. Don't let the candy cloud your mind otherwise the pinatas will escape.
